import React from 'react' import { Col, Row, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import products from '../products'; function ProductScreen({ match }) { const product = products.find(p => p._id === match.params.id); console.log(product); return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description {product.description} Price {product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'} ) } export default ProductScreen
